title: SWITCHGEAR AND CONTROLGEAR
fullText: The switchboards or panel boards and distribution boards shall be loaded as near as practicable to their normal working load in order to ensure no overheating occurs due to faulty connections or incorrect rating. Switches, circuit-breakers and controls shall be operated on load to test their suitability and to demonstrate that the operation of overcurrent, undervoltage and reverse-current or reverse-power protective devices are electrically and mechanically satisfactory.
